com.pizza.CMController

Class GrosseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizza.CMController.GrosseController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GrosseController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Controls the GrosseEintrag Model

    The GrosseController class implements the controller of the GrosseEintrag model. It contains some methods used to fetch the entries of the Grosse table from the database as well as other values
    See Also:

        public java.util.List<GrosseEintrag> getEintraege()
        This method gets all the entries from the Grosse table
        Returns:
        List This is a list of all the Grosse entries

      • getEintraege

        public java.util.List<GrosseEintrag> getEintraege(java.lang.Integer speiseId)
        This method gets all the entries from the Grosse table that have a specific speiseId. Ex. a speise X that has speiseID id_X can have more than one size i.e. Grosse.
        Parameters:
        speiseId - This is the ID of the speise whose grosse entry we are looking for
        Returns:
        List This is a list of Grosse entries with SpeiseId = speiseId

      • getGrosseId

        public java.lang.Integer getGrosseId(java.lang.String grosseName)
        This method gets the Grosse Id from the Grosse table with a specific grosseName
        Parameters:
        grosseName - This is the name of the grosse whose ID we are looking for
        Returns:
        Integer This is the grosseID whose name = grosseName
